comment._content: From files.usgwarchives.net/ny/suffolk/obits/nd/2005/feb/nd20f... Raffell, Rodd RAFFELL-Rodd, of Oceanside, New York, on February 15, 2005, one month shy of his ninety-first birthday. Despite recent failing health, Mr. Raffell still wrote and arranged and lead a 26-piece concert jazz orchestra. He has been associated with such big bands as Charlie Spivak, Sammy Kaye, Jimmy Dorsey and Stan Kenton. Rodd Raffell also fronted his own big bands, which were well established in the mid-western states, prior to moving to Long Island. He leaves behind beloved daughters, Jamie Raffell and Myrna Berrios of Oceanside. A Memorial Service will be held at Malverne Funeral Home, 330 Hempstead Ave., Malverne, Tuesday evening, February 22, from 7-9 PM (516-593-7230). Published in Newsday on 2/20/2005.
